WELCOME.TITLE2: provides a portfolio of network management applications run as dedicated per-user instances in the cloud.
WELCOME.INTRO_TEXT: GÉANT’s NMaaS service includes three aspects: providing, managing and maintaining the infrastructure of the NMaaS service portal, platform and selected tools, supporting users in using the system, and the selected tools for monitoring their networks via NMaaS, as well as supporting users that contribute their software to NMaaS system.
WELCOME.TARGET_USERS_TEXT: NMaaS users are organisations that do not want to own NMS infrastructure themselves and/or want to outsource network management, as well as organisations and/or individuals that are searching for quality network management software or who want to share their software within the community.
WELCOME.MARKETPLACE_TEXT: NMaaS Marketplace is a catalogue of available open source tools, supported by community, distributed free, chosen by administration. There is also place for your application choice - you can propose new applications.
WELCOME.COST_REDUCTION_TEXT: With NMaaS, users do not have to bear the ownership costs and risks related to maintenance and control of the network management infrastructure.
WELCOME.SECURITY_TEXT: With NMaaS, you don't have to worry about security. We provide safe connection to separated instances by VPN to your network - to allow institutions and projects to safe management of network.
WELCOME.SCALING_TEXT: If You need some horizontal scaling - there is no problem with that on NMaaS. You can very easily scale Your instances in few minutes.
WELCOME.APP_MARKET_TEXT: At store You can find top picked applications to manage and maintain Your network infrastructure, chosen by administrators and community.
WELCOME.OWN_APPS_TEXT: You want to share your own application with the community? NMaaS is open for addition of new applications.
WELCOME.EDUGAIN_SUPPORT_TEXT: You don't need to create a new account. Login using an existing account from you identity provider federated under eduGAIN.
WELCOME.FAST_DEPLOYMENT_TEXT: Upon your request applications are deployed within minutes with custom configuration provided through a simple wizard.
WELCOME.WEB_PORTAL_TEXT: NMaaS provides a modern web-based user portal that follows reactive design principle.
WELCOME.KUBERNETES_TEXT: User application instances are deployed in Kubernetes cluster run on top of dedicated hardware infrastructure assuring high performance and reliability.
WELCOME.TIME_EXPIRED: Logged out due to inactivity. To continue your work log in again.

REGISTRATION.THANK_YOU_MESSAGE: Thank you for submitting the registration form. Your account needs to be enabled by the system administrator. This make take some time.
REGISTRATION.UNABLE_TO_UPDATE_USER_MESSAGE: Unable to update newly registered user.

LOGIN.APPLICATION_UNDER_MAINTENANCE_MESSAGE: Application is undergoing maintenance right now. Please try again later.
LOGIN.LOGIN_CAN_NOT_BE_PERFORMED_MESSAGE: System component login cannot be performed

TEST_INSTANCE_MODAL.BODY: Please be aware that this is a test NMaaS instance. The user isolation and data security measures are not so strict as on the production instance. Do not use this instance to monitor real equipment.

PROVIDE_SSH_KEY_MODAL.BODY: Please note that in order to be able to update deployed application configuration You need to add a public SSH key on your Profile page. This key will be later on used to access dedicated Git repository containing application configuration files.

CLUSTERS.REST_API_PORT_REQUIRED_MESSAGE: REST API host port is required

CLUSTERS.IP_VALIDATION_MESSAGE: IP must contain only digits and dots
CLUSTERS.NETWORK_ADDRESS_VALIDATION_MESSAGE: Network address must contain only digits and dots

DOMAIN_DETAILS.CODE_NAME_PATTERN_MESSAGE_2: Codename has to be 2-8 characters long.

MODAL.DESCRIPTION:
Do you want to completely remove this domain?
Note that all running application instances within this domain will be deactivated and all domain users will have their roles removed as well.

USER_PRIVILEGES.NO_ROLES_INFO: Your aren't assigned to any domain yet. Please contact the administrator if You have further questions.

APPLICATIONS.RATING_INFO: Click star to rate an application
APPLICATIONS.TOOLTIP_MESSAGE_DEPLOY: You cannot deploy this application, because it is disabled in your domain. Contact your domain admin for further information.
APPLICATIONS.TOOLTIP_MESSAGE_SUBSCRIBE: You cannot subscribe this application, because it is disabled in your domain. Contact your domain admin for further information.

RESTART_MODAL.BODY: Do you want to restart this application instance?

ABORT_MODAL.BODY: Do you want to abort this application instance deployment process?

INSTALL_MODAL.INSTANCE_NAME_PATTERN_ERROR: Instance name must only contain a-z, A-Z, 0-9 and - characters
INSTALL_MODAL.INSTANCE_NAME_LENGTH_ERROR: Instance name has to be 3-10 characters long

ENABLE_AUTO_UPGRADES_MODAL.BODY: Do you want to enable automatic upgrades for this application instance?

DISABLE_AUTO_UPGRADES_MODAL.BODY:
Do you want to disable automatic upgrades for this application instance?
You will be still able to trigger upgrades manually.

APP_INSTANCE.DEPLOYMENT_IN_PROGRESS:
Application is being activated. This process may take up to several minutes.
You will be notified with an email once your instance is ready.

INSTALLATION_PROGRESS.DEFAULT_ERROR_MESSAGE:
Application deployment failed due to an unexpected error. NMaaS support team has been notified already.
In order to raise an issue use the contact form.

CONFIGURATION.DOCUMENTATION_INFO: Detailed field descriptions are available at

USER_FRIENDLY.VALIDATION: Validating available resources for new deployment
USER_FRIENDLY.PREPARATION: Preparing deployment environment for your application
USER_FRIENDLY.CONNECTING: Verifying secure connectivity to your equipment
USER_FRIENDLY.CONFIGURATION_AWAITING:
Your application instance was successfully deployed.
In order to proceed, provide first time configuration using the Configure action button
USER_FRIENDLY.DEPLOYING:
Application is being activated. This process may take up to several minutes.
You will be notified with an email once your instance is ready
USER_FRIENDLY.RUNNING:
Your application is now active. You can access it using the Access option from the Actions menu.
Use the Configure and Members options to update the configuration and the list of application users respectively.
USER_FRIENDLY.UNDEPLOYING: Your application is being deactivated. This process may take up to several minutes
USER_FRIENDLY.UNKNOWN:
Unknown state of application.
In order to raise an issue use the contact form.

UPGRADE_MODAL.BODY: Do you want to upgrade this application instance?

RESET_PASSWORD.GO_BACK: Go back to the NMaaS page

MODAL.BODY: If you have provided valid email we will send to you link for resetting password. Please be advised that you can only reset password for local account.

UPDATE_CONFIG_MODAL.CLONE_LABEL: Use the following command to clone the Git repository containing configuration files used by this application instance. Each change applied to any of the files and pushed back to the repository will be used to update the running application.

APPS_MANAGEMENT.TITLE: Applications management
APPS_MANAGEMENT.NAME: Name
APPS_MANAGEMENT.SEND_NOTIFICATION: Send email notification to all users
APPS_MANAGEMENT.ADD_JSON_VERSION: Add application version using JSON file
APPS_MANAGEMENT.JSON_ERROR: JSON formatting validation error - please check the JSON

APPS_PREVIEW.PREVIEW_MESSAGE: This page is only a preview of the application data to be submitted. Please double check the content and confirm the request.

APPS_WIZARD.FIRST_PAGE_MESSAGE: You are about to fill in a request for adding new application to the NMaaS portfolio. You will be guided through a few step process of providing all necessary information about the application, its description, deployment and configuration details. Once the request is submitted it will be reviewed by administrator and either approved or rejected with a proper comment send via email. By checking the box below you confirm that you have the right to publish this application in NMaaS.
APPS_WIZARD.ACCEPT_RULES_CHECKBOX: I read the general instructions above
APPS_WIZARD.NEW_TAGS_LABEL: Add new tags for your application

NEW_APP_MODAL.BODY: Thank you for submitting new application. Your request must be now reviewed by NMaaS Team. It may take some time.

EDIT_APP_MODAL.BODY: Thank you for editing existing application. Your changes should be applied soon

APPS_WIZARD.ACCEPT_RULES_TOOLTIP: You have to accept the rules!
APPS_WIZARD.LICENSE_TOOLTIP: Enter name of license under which application is distributed. Please make sure that application can be used in NMaaS.
APPS_WIZARD.LICENSE_URL_TOOLTIP: To give user more information about license and permissions to use, provide link to license description.
APPS_WIZARD.PROJECT_WEBSITE_TOOLTIP: To give user more information about whole project, provide link to project website.
APPS_WIZARD.SOURCE_CODE_TOOLTIP: Url to project source code e.g. github.com/project.
APPS_WIZARD.PROJECT_ISSUES_TOOLTIP: To be sure that users can always find way to report bug to team responsible for tool, provide link to issues, e.g. github.com/project/issues.
APPS_WIZARD.TAGS_TOOLTIP: Please select tags which describes application. This will help users to find applications more effectively.
APPS_WIZARD.NEW_TAGS_TOOLTIP: You can add tags for your application if existing tags doesn't describe your application well. Type tag name and press enter to add new tag.
APPS_WIZARD.BRIEF_DESCRIPTION_TOOLTIP: Enter brief description of application. This text will be displayed on NMaaS market page.
APPS_WIZARD.FULL_DESCRIPTION_TOOLTIP: Enter full description of application. This text will be displayed on application details page.
APPS_WIZARD.CHART_NAME_TOOLTIP: Enter name of chart, which will be used in NMaaS.
APPS_WIZARD.CHART_VERSION_TOOLTIP: Enter version of chart, which will be used in NMaaS.
APPS_WIZARD.MAIN_DEPLOYMENT_NAME_TOOLTIP: Enter the name of main component deployed by this chart.
APPS_WIZARD.DEFAULT_STORAGE_SPACE_TOOLTIP: Enter default storage space required by the application (in gigabytes). This value can be changed by the user during deployment.
APPS_WIZARD.DEPLOY_PARAMETER_TOOLTIP: Some applications may use global NMaaS settings. If you want to use one of them please specify how we should pass that variable.
APPS_WIZARD.REPOSITORY_REQUIRED_TOOLTIP: NMaaS can use GitLab to store configuration of each instance.
APPS_WIZARD.DISABLED_NEXT_BUTTON_TOOLTIP: You have to fill all required fields!
APPS_WIZARD.CONFIG_FILEDIRECTORY_TOOLTIP: Enter the name of folder in which the configuration file should be placed in repository
APPS_WIZARD.CONFIG_CONTENT_TOOLTIP: Enter configuration file content template. Please be advised that it has to be compatible with FreeMarker Template Language.
APPS_WIZARD.OPTIONAL_LANGS_TOOLTIP: You can provide additional translations of descriptions into optional languages.
APPS_WIZARD.BASIC_APP_INFO_STEP_INFO: Basic set of information about the application. Application can be filtered by tag. Select an existing tag or create a new one if none is suitable.
APPS_WIZARD.LOGO_AND_SCREENSHOTS_STEP_INFO: Application logo is displayed in various views in the application. A set of screenshots should give a nice overview of the application's UI.
APPS_WIZARD.APP_DESCRIPTIONS_STEP_INFO: Brief and full descriptions of the application should provide a basic (limited length) and comprehensive information about the nature and purpose of the application. Descriptions should be provided in as many supported languages as possible.
APPS_WIZARD.APP_DEPLOYMENT_SPEC_STEP_INFO: Applications offered through NMaaS are deployed in Kubernetes as Helm charts. Basic information about the chart is required with additional set of optional parameters to be passed during the installation process.
APPS_WIZARD.CONFIG_TEMPLATES_STEP_INFO: NMaaS applications are populated with basic configuration parameters provided by users using a wizard. The list of configuration files (with parameterized content) to be used and loaded by the application at startup should be provided. Those need to be complemented with the definition of the wizard component dedicated for particular application allowing user to provide all necessary parameters used to populate configuration files.
APPS_WIZARD.BASIC_AUTH_TOOLTIP: You can add basic authentication for your application simply by checking this checkbox.
APPS_WIZARD.TERMS_ACCEPTANCE_TOOLTIP: If application has some special license requirements, you can provide them
APPS_WIZARD.TERMS_CONTENT_TOOLTIP: Enter special license requirements to be accepted by user
APPS_WIZARD.ADD_CONFIG_UPDATE_TEMPLATE_TOOLTIP: Check if your application supports configuration updates
APPS_WIZARD.EXPOSE_WEB_UI_TOOLTIP: Check if application is exposing web user interface
APPS_WIZARD.ALLOW_SSH_ACCESS_TOOLTIP: Check if application allows SSH access
APPS_WIZARD.ALLOW_LOG_ACCESS_TOOLTIP: Check if application allows log access
APPS_WIZARD.PROJECT_NMAAS_DOCUMENTATION_TOOLTIP: Provide URL to NMaaS Documentation (NMaaS Tools)

APP_STORAGE_VOLUME_EDIT.CHANGES_TOOLTIP: Accept or reject changes in deployment parameters

APP_ACCESS_METHOD_EDIT.NAME: Name
APP_ACCESS_METHOD_EDIT.CHANGES_TOOLTIP: Accept or reject changes in deployment parameters

ABOUT.CONTACT_DESC: Contact form offers an easy way to get in touch with the NMaaS team. Choose the type of form that is most suitable for your request.
ABOUT.CHANGELOG_DESC: Below you will find detailed information about the current NMaaS version and summary of changes introduced in previous software releases.

FORMIO.NAME: Name
FORMIO.DOMAIN_NAME_DESCRIPTION: Proposed name for the new domain (up to 30 characters)
FORMIO.DOMAIN_CODENAME_DESCRIPTION: Abbreviated version of the domain name (up to 12 characters)
FORMIO.JUSTIFICATION_DESCRIPTION: Brief justification of the request including intended use of the NMaaS service
FORMIO.VPN_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: Two types of software-based VPN solutions are currently supported. Select the preferred one
FORMIO.VPN_USER_IP: Public IP for VPN tunnel setup
FORMIO.VPN_USER_IP_DESCRIPTION: Public IP for VPN tunnel termination on user end
FORMIO.VPN_USER_SUBNETS_DESCRIPTION: List of monitored subnets that should be reachable from your application deployed on NMaaS
FORMIO.ADDITIONAL_VPN_SUBNETS_DESCRIPTION: Additional IP ranges that should be reachable from your NMaaS applications, outside those specified above (e.g. some public services)
FORMIO.TECH_CONTACT_DESCRIPTION: Person to be contacted to further discuss technical matters related with VPN setup
FORMIO.ISSUE_DOMAIN_NAME_DESCRIPTION: Name of the domain affected by the issue
FORMIO.ISSUE_APPLICATION_NAME_DESCRIPTION: Name of the application affected by the issue
FORMIO.ISSUE_DESCRIPTION_PLACEHOLDER: Detailed description of the encountered issue
